column5: Great house for Super Bowl Week! $1,200 per night. Three night min. please. $1,500 refundable deposit required. 50% Non refundable payment to secure rental and the balance in full when you arrive.     2000 square feet home   Three Bedrooms   Two Full Baths   Master Bath w/Jacuzzi Tub   Two Living Areas   Two Eating Areas   Dining Space for up to 12 People   Sleeps Eight comfortably - Nine if you use the front living room sofa   Big Screen Television   Full Cable Service   Free Long Distance Phone Calls   WI-FI   Full Size Washer/Dryer   Fully Stocked Pantry and Fridge.   Party Package Avialable Upon Request = Garage Refrig. filled with Beer/Wine etc. Additional Charge.   Ride to and from Stadium on Game Day Included for up to Nine People if you Rent for the Entire Week.   Smoking Allowed Outside Only  Sorry, No Pets
